getVersion

Overview

This call is used to get the current version and build date of the app.

BSGv3 BSGv2 Show Additional Data Elements
     

Request

Parameters

Parameter Description Required
op Operation Yes
uid User ID Yes

Sample Request { "op": "getVersion", "uid": "TWISTUSER001" }

Response

Success: { "response": { "status": "success", "result": { "version": "3.13", "buildDate": "12-11-2015", "buildNo": "1" } } }

Error: { "response": { "status": "error", "description": "error description" } }
